about_the_game:
"If you're not careful and you noclip out of reality in the wrong areas, you'll end up in the Backrooms, where it's nothing but the stink of old moist carpet, the madness of mono-yellow, the endless background noise of fluorescent lights at maximum hum-buzz, and approximately six hundred million square miles of randomly segmented empty rooms to be trapped in

"Backrooms: Step Into The Void" is a first-person psychological horror game that thrusts players into the unsettling and disorienting labyrinth of the Backrooms. Combining elements of intense psychological terror with heart-pounding action sequences, the game challenges players to navigate through an eerie, seemingly infinite maze of monotonous yellow rooms and fluorescent-lit hallways. With a focus on atmosphere and immersion, "Backrooms: Step Into The Void" presents a relentless sense of dread, as players must solve puzzles, evade sinister entities, and uncover the mysteries lurking within the void. The game's haunting environment and unpredictable threats ensure a spine-chilling experience that keeps players on edge from start to finish.

Atmosphere


Immerse yourself in the unsettling world of the Backrooms, where each step deepens your descent into a maze of musty, dimly-lit corridors and vast, empty rooms. The oppressive hum of flickering fluorescent lights and the scent of aged carpet create an eerie, claustrophobic environment. Shadows dance at the edge of your vision, and distant noises hint at lurking dangers. Every level blurs reality further, heightening the tension as you strive to escape the horrors stalking you. Can you find your way out, or will you be lost forever in the madness?

Exploration


Navigate through a variety of unique levels inspired by the original Backrooms concept. Explore The Lobby, visit Pipe Dreams, check out Terror Hotel, enjoy Level Fun, immerse yourself in Sublimity and many other delightful locations.

Be careful!


Beware of the lurking horrors that inhabit the Backrooms. As you navigate the endless maze, you must stay vigilant and cautious. Stray from the path, and you risk encountering malevolent entities that stalk the shadows, each more terrifying and relentless than the last. These creatures are drawn to your presence, and a single wrong turn could lead you straight into their grasp. In the Backrooms, danger is ever-present, and survival depends on your wits and awareness.

  • Storage: 10 GB available space

  • Processor: Quad-core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
